body_html:
Hi,

Have you tried to use less memory during training, constraining your GPU to work with less memory ?
Just pass:

#Memory constrain
gpu_options = tf.GPUOptions(per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.5)
cfg_ = tf.ConfigProto(gpu_options=gpu_options)

#... later, pass this into your session, like this
tf.Session(config=cfg_)

Let me know if it worked.
body_text:
Hi,
Have you tried to use less memory during training, constraining your GPU to work with less memory ?
Just pass:
#Memory constrain
gpu_options = tf.GPUOptions(per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.5)
cfg_ = tf.ConfigProto(gpu_options=gpu_options)

#... later, pass this into your session, like this
tf.Session(config=cfg_)

Let me know if it worked.
body:
Hi, 

Have you tried to use less memory during training, constraining your GPU to work with less memory ?
Just pass:

```
#Memory constrain
gpu_options = tf.GPUOptions(per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.5)
cfg_ = tf.ConfigProto(gpu_options=gpu_options)

#... later, pass this into your session, like this
tf.Session(config=cfg_)
```

Let me know if it worked.
